meanings.definition: A collection of preserved plant specimens for scientific study.
meanings.sent1: The herbaria at the museum contain many different types of plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use herbaria to learn more about different plant species.
meanings.sent3: The herbaria were so full that they started spilling out onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like a herbaria, carefully preserving memories of each plant.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the herbaria felt like exploring a botanical time capsule.

meanings.definition: The building or room where such a collection is kept.
meanings.sent1: Visitors were not allowed into the herbaria without permission.
meanings.sent2: The herbaria was a quiet place, perfect for studying plant specimens.
meanings.sent3: The herbaria door creaked loudly every time someone entered.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were stored in the herbaria of her mind, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The herbaria smelled of dried leaves and old books, a comforting scent for botanists.
